about_the_game:
Like a destroyer on steroids, cruiser Huanghe is armed with Smoke Generator, six torpedo tubes, the choice between Hydroacoustic Search or Torpedo Reload Booster, a devastating main battery of six 152 mm guns, and a bad attitude.

Key features:

  • Low detectability

  • Access to the Crawling Smoke Generator consumable

  • High AA defense efficient

  • Low survivability.

This package includes:

  • Huanghe, Pan-Asian Tier VI Cruiser

  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.
detailed_description:
Like a destroyer on steroids, cruiser Huanghe is armed with Smoke Generator, six torpedo tubes, the choice between Hydroacoustic Search or Torpedo Reload Booster, a devastating main battery of six 152 mm guns, and a bad attitude.

Key features:

  • Low detectability

  • Access to the Crawling Smoke Generator consumable

  • High AA defense efficient

This package includes:

  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

Violence

Violence Against Non-Humans

• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")

Users Interact
• User generated content shared with others
